content.text: I want to create a new page called “careers2.html”.

On “careers.html”, I want to put a button below this sentence: “We are always on the lookout for energetic and entrepreneurial talent. We are currently implementing our next ATS (Applicant Tracking System). Stay tuned!” That says “Explore Jobs”. I want this button to point to “careers2.html”. For now, on “careers2.html”, I want to put some text that shows that this page is currently under construction. currentFile.content:
3N Consulting
Results. Delivered.
Home About Us Services Careers Contact Us Meet Our Team Our Toolkit Disclaimers
Execution-focused consulting measured on outcomes

Results. Delivered.

3N Consulting is a Maryland-based management consulting firm that builds long-term partnerships, takes ownership of outcomes, and practices frugality so savings flow to clients.

Certified MD Minority Business Enterprise (MBE) Small Business Reserve (SBR) Program NMSDC Certified MBE
Discuss your initiative → View recent case studies
Our work in motion
MD MBE • SBR NMSDC Certified MBE
MD MBE
NMSDC

Proud to support Maryland's public agencies, colleges, and communities.

Why 3N Consulting?

Because we maintain integrity, value clients, and deliver results.

Our model is built for outcome-based partnerships, true ownership of commitments, and a cost structure that puts client value first.

Vested in client success

Outcome-based partnerships and long-term relationships.

Ownership

We don't "staff"—we own results and keep our commitments.

Cost structure

Frugal by design—invest in talent, minimize overhead, pass savings on.

Client testimonials

What our clients say

Our performance is continuously evaluated. Below are excerpts from formal client satisfaction surveys.

State Education Agency ~ Project Executive

"3N delivered tremendous value"

Client Satisfaction Survey Rating:
Quality of Work: "Exceptional"
Management Team: "Exceptional"
Cost Control: "Exceptional"
Schedule Management: "Very Good"
1 / 3
Capabilities

Core areas where we deliver results

These capability areas link into your service lines and toolkits, supported by proven methods like O-RAM and AAA.

Organizational Redesign

Align structure, people, and processes for resilience and agility.

Strategy & Operations

Corporate strategy. Interim management. Lean improvements that minimize waste and maximize efficiency.

Data Analytics

Frameworks & dashboards that uncover patterns and predict trends.

Digital Transformation

From legacy modernization to AI—reduce the ~70% failure risk with alignment.

Human Capital & Change Management

Strengthen engagement, accelerate adoption, and lead with purpose.

Productized solution offerings

Solutions we can rapidly deploy

Solutions we can rapidly deploy through assets developed over years of knowledge and experience—in procurement, manufacturing, and technology.

Manufacturing

Planning, operations, and process redesign for manufacturers seeking to scale while maintaining service and quality.

CIO Services

Portfolio rationalization, IT strategy, and value-focused technology investment for public sector and mid-market organizations.

Procurement

A structured procurement solution to unlock savings, improve compliance, and turn purchasing into a strategic advantage.

Results. Delivered. Execution-focused consulting measured on outcomes.
We build long-term partnerships, take ownership of outcomes, and practice frugality so savings flow to clients.
Phone: (301) 723-7057
Address: 6710A Rockledge Drive, Bethesda, MD 20817
LinkedIn About Us Services Careers Meet Our Team Our Toolkit Contact Us Disclaimers

Join Our Team

We're Hiring

We're looking for energetic and entrepreneurial talent to join 3N Consulting and make a real impact on our clients' success.

Career Opportunities

We are always on the lookout for energetic and entrepreneurial talent. We are currently implementing our next ATS (Applicant Tracking System). Stay tuned!

Explore Jobs →

If you have any other questions regarding careers at 3N, you may direct any inquiries to:

careers@3nconsultinggroup.com

Why Join 3N Consulting?

Be part of a team that values integrity, ownership, and results.

  • Work with a team that maintains integrity and values client success
  • Ownership mindset—we own our results
  • Cost-conscious culture—we pass savings to clients
  • Opportunity to work on high-impact projects with leading organizations
  • Collaborative environment with experienced consultants

Ready to Join Our Team?

Send your inquiry to careers@3nconsultinggroup.com or get in touch with us for more information.

content.text: The digital-transformation.html and data-analytics.html pages are missing the "3N Consulting
Results. Delivered." slogan that should be next to the logo on the top left that are there in other pages

currentFile.content:
3N Consulting
Results. Delivered.
Home About Us Services Careers Contact Us Meet Our Team Our Toolkit Disclaimers
Execution-focused consulting measured on outcomes

Results. Delivered.

3N Consulting is a Maryland-based management consulting firm that builds long-term partnerships, takes ownership of outcomes, and practices frugality so savings flow to clients.

Certified MD Minority Business Enterprise (MBE) Small Business Reserve (SBR) Program NMSDC Certified MBE
Discuss your initiative → View recent case studies
Our work in motion
MD MBE • SBR NMSDC Certified MBE
MD MBE
NMSDC

Proud to support Maryland's public agencies, colleges, and communities.

Why 3N Consulting?

Because we maintain integrity, value clients, and deliver results.

Our model is built for outcome-based partnerships, true ownership of commitments, and a cost structure that puts client value first.

Vested in client success

Outcome-based partnerships and long-term relationships.

Ownership

We don't "staff"—we own results and keep our commitments.

Cost structure

Frugal by design—invest in talent, minimize overhead, pass savings on.

Client testimonials

What our clients say

Our performance is continuously evaluated. Below are excerpts from formal client satisfaction surveys.

State Education Agency ~ Project Executive

"3N delivered tremendous value"

Client Satisfaction Survey Rating:
Quality of Work: "Exceptional"
Management Team: "Exceptional"
Cost Control: "Exceptional"
Schedule Management: "Very Good"
1 / 3
Capabilities

Core areas where we deliver results

These capability areas link into your service lines and toolkits, supported by proven methods like O-RAM and AAA.

Organizational Redesign

Align structure, people, and processes for resilience and agility.

Strategy & Operations

Corporate strategy. Interim management. Lean improvements that minimize waste and maximize efficiency.

Data Analytics

Frameworks & dashboards that uncover patterns and predict trends.

Digital Transformation

From legacy modernization to AI—reduce the ~70% failure risk with alignment.

Human Capital & Change Management

Strengthen engagement, accelerate adoption, and lead with purpose.

Productized solution offerings

Solutions we can rapidly deploy

Solutions we can rapidly deploy through assets developed over years of knowledge and experience—in procurement, manufacturing, and technology.

Manufacturing

Planning, operations, and process redesign for manufacturers seeking to scale while maintaining service and quality.

CIO Services

Portfolio rationalization, IT strategy, and value-focused technology investment for public sector and mid-market organizations.

Procurement

A structured procurement solution to unlock savings, improve compliance, and turn purchasing into a strategic advantage.

Results. Delivered. Execution-focused consulting measured on outcomes.
We build long-term partnerships, take ownership of outcomes, and practice frugality so savings flow to clients.
Phone: (301) 723-7057
Address: 6710A Rockledge Drive, Bethesda, MD 20817

Home About Us Services Careers Contact Us Meet Our Team Our Toolkit Disclaimers
Core Capability

Digital Transformation

From legacy modernization to AI—reduce the ~70% failure risk with alignment.

The Foundation

Reimagining How Organizations Work in the Digital Era

Digital Transformation is more than technology adoption — it's a fundamental rethinking of how organizations create value, deliver services, and operate every day. It means aligning strategy, people, process, and technology to enable agility, innovation, and measurable results.

At 3N Consulting, we view Digital Transformation as the bridge between mission and modernization. We help clients move from legacy systems and manual workflows to intelligent, data-driven operations — ensuring technology serves strategy, not the other way around.
